title: Osteopaths and chiropractors giving COVID-19 vaccines legally
description: The different legal mechanisms to give the vaccine are described based on General Osteopathic Council (GOsC) or General Chiropractic Council (GCC) registration
cleaned_text: can: - work under the National Protocol (stages 2-4) - work under a PSD written by an appropriate practitioner This group cannot: - act as clinical supervisor for the National Protocol under Regulation 3A - write a Patient Specific Direction (PSD) - work under the Patient Group Direction (PGD) Chiropractor registered with GCC This group can: - work under the National Protocol (stages 2-4) - work under a PSD written by an appropriate practitioner This group cannot: - act as clinical supervisor for the National Protocol under Regulation 3A - write a Patient Specific Direction (PSD) - work under the Patient Group Direction (PGD) Update history - Title amended - The current content is still accurate. - The current content is still accurate. - The current content is still accurate. - The current content is still accurate. - The current content is still accurate. - Abbreviation of General Osteopathic Council amended - Chiropractor added.
